name: Ring Toss & World Tour
description:
■■Game Description■■
Travel the world in the palm of your hand with Ringtoss!
Take a trip around the world with the lovely Alice in Ringtoss!

■■Game Features■■
▶ Lifelike water rendered by a powerful physics engine
▶ Tilt your phone to solve puzzles
▶ More than 300 puzzles to baffle your brain
▶ Visit landmarks all over the world
▶ Explore new areas and collect costumes
▶ Challenge yourself by taking on Bonus Stages
▶ Gather items to help you complete particularly tricky challenges

■Customer Service
Are you having trouble playing the game?
In-game Settings -> Please contact customer service by phone or email.
※ Customer Service Email:

Terms of Use: https://m.nexon.com/term/10
Privacy Policy: https://m.nexon.com/term/11

[Note: Wi-Fi, 3G or 4G network connection is required. Data charges may apply during play. Connection to a Wi-Fi network is recommended.]
[Supported devices: Minimum specs matching iOS 9.1 or higher]

■ Smartphone App Access Permission Guide
We do not ask for your personal information.
[Essential Access Rights]
Camera: Taking screenshots to help with customer service inquiries
Photo: Registering screenshots for customer service
[Access Right Withdrawal Process]
Settings > Privacy > Select access rights > Select whether to grant or revoke access

■If you delete the app, your save data will be lost.
